input_args.passage: 'Anthony Doerr | Anthony Doerr (born October 27, 1973) is an American author of novels and short stories. He gained widespread recognition for his 2014 novel All the Light ...'
input_args.claim: 'According to the first source, Anthony Doerr was born and raised in Cleveland, Ohio, and is known for his story collections The Shell Collector and Memory Wall, as well as his memoir Four Seasons.'
